text: Hope is a district municipality in British Columbia, Canada. Hope is in the confluence of both of the Fraser and Coquihalla rivers. As of 2021, 6,686 people lived there. The current mayor of Hope is Victor Smith. During World War II there was a internment camp in Hope for the Canadians of Japanese extraction. ==Other websites== *City of Hope's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:Lower Mainland
